column4: My OpenOffice is not working right. Everything (Presentation, Spreadsheet, etc.) opens Word Processor and only after going through a document recovery process.
that might be because openoffice is a buggy pile of crap? ;-)
if it is a pile of crap, is there an alternative?
crap. Removing the program and then reinstalling it didn't fix the problem at all.
any ideas?
no, I don't really have ideas, I'm just negative... (Personally I found that OOo will always crash if I have any mp3 playing software running at the same time)
you could try Abiword and Gnumeric
or vim, sc, and latex, if you fancy getting oldschool
thanks.
also, even if it opens up the document writer by default, you should be able to go "New -> Spreadsheet" or similar
I'll try that.
what's a good command to free up disk space (other than obviously removing/uninstalling stuff)?
also worth trying the Disk Usage Analyser, or the ohter one that shows a pretty pie chart, to see where your space is going
right.
filelight was the disk usage thing I was thinking of
it seems like I have to ask a question 20 times before someone answers if I don't direct it to someone specifically. I have one more issue I was wondering if you might know anything about.
I can't change my greeting on my login screen to a custom greeting. every time it automatically restores the default Welcome!
yes, that's frustrating, but the thing is, I answered the questions I a) had time for, b) was interested in, c) knew something about...
I'm afraid I don't know in this case... you're best off asking in public (and yes, I do get that that can be frustrating :-( )

I wasn't talking about you ignoring questions. I just meant that if I pose a question to anyone, it doesn't get answered. I aksed the question many times, but only got answered when I specifically directed it at you.
See what I'm saying?
yarr... well, good luck!  (/me heads off to lunch)
enjoy your lunch.
